title: NFTCollectorsTs
author: NFTCollectorsTs
content: Hello,We are looking to hire a media marketing manager for our NFT project launched on social media.We offer employment contract and advantageous salary.We are waiting for you to contact us publicly or privately.Thank you.

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: Reach out to me via Telegram: @ElevatedWarrior

comments.author: Commguard
comments.body: Hello. I'm available to offer such services. Please ping me on Telegram for us to discuss further. TG: @Commguard

comments.author: NFTCollectorsTs
comments.body: Quote from: Techdev on September 14, 2022, 07:42:44 AMReach out to me via Telegram: @ElevatedWarriorHello,Let's talk on skype chat or shoot a short email here: CreativeMarketingIdeas@outlook.comSkype: CreativeMarketingIdeasThank you.

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: Are you still looking for social media engagement? Also, I have a background as a Discord moderator for games and engagement in the community.I have experience on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, TikTok and Youtube.Reach me out if still needed @Peanutswar

comments.author: TimtheYoutuber
comments.body: My company Media Boots can help https://www.mediaboots.com I will send you a message and we can connect

comments.body: CLICK HEREOr contact me on tele @igebotz

Also, I have a background as a Discord moderator for games and engagement in the community.I have experience on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, TikTok and Youtube.Reach me out if still needed @PeanutswarPlease write to me on Telegram: https://t.me/Mash_man/

comments.body: Need for my site contact tg @Tjortho7

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Another reputable member of the forum is offering their services that seem like it might apply to you here.  Take a look at this thread and maybe you'll find what you're looking for.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5395795.0I am not endorsing him at all or anything, but it seems like you guys are looking for each other after a quick glimpse of the threads here.  Might be worth reaching out and seeing if you're on the same page.  Good luck with your project!

comments.author: Cryptock
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on September 25, 2022, 07:26:24 PMAnother reputable member of the forum is offering their services that seem like it might apply to you here.  Take a look at this thread and maybe you'll find what you're looking for.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5395795.0I am not endorsing him at all or anything, but it seems like you guys are looking for each other after a quick glimpse of the threads here.  Might be worth reaching out and seeing if you're on the same page.  Good luck with your project!I have been managing social media for past many years. I have not done the NFT projects - but I believe there is a big market on Twitter. Have you been able to find the manager yet. If not we can discuss.

comments.author: Blawpaw
comments.body: I would be a good fit! Hit me on telegram and let's discuss! @CryptoBiter

comments.author: Cryptock
comments.body: Quote from: NFTCollectorsTs on September 14, 2022, 02:54:47 AMHello,We are looking to hire a media marketing manager for our NFT project launched on social media.We offer employment contract and advantageous salary.We are waiting for you to contact us publicly or privately.Thank you.I believe OP has found the manager - he seems inactive after making the post. But still I am interested in knowing -- did he manage to find the best fit?Looking Fwd for your reply OP>
